snippet: Mostafa Kamel Mostafa, on trial for terrorism-related charges, testified that his injury occurred while testing liquid explosives in Pakistan.
abstract: Mostafa Kamel Mostafa, on trial for terrorism-related charges, testifies in Manhattan courtroom that loss of his forearms and eye were result of injuries sustained while testing liquid explosives for an engineering project in Pakistan.
lead_paragraph: Mostafa Kamel Mostafa, on trial for terrorism-related charges, testified that his injury occurred while testing liquid explosives in Pakistan.

headline.main: At His Trial, Imam Tells of Losing His Forearms
headline.print_headline: At His Trial, Imam Tells of Losing His Forearms
